attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are single parents being FORCED back to work when married and un-married couples can claim working tax credits and be allowed to stay at home and give their children stable, loving homes. Just because we have divorced, is there a law that states we forfeit the right to teach our children respect, manners and be there for them the same as people that have partners or spouses?
